Those are some of the most emotional experiences of my life - spouses or moms grabbing you, not letting you go and crying. It takes everything you‚Äôve got to remain professional.  Now by all means if the family wants VIPs there, it‚Äôs a ceremony to honor their loved one and that‚Äôs what matters most.
